snippet: An exhibition at the Los Angeles museum highlights recent architectural innovation in the region over the last 25 years. In this revealing video, some of the featured architects explain why they chose their trade.
abstract: An exhibition at the Los Angeles museum highlights recent architectural innovation in the region over the last 25 years. In this revealing video, some of the featured architects explain why they chose their trade.
